amountInjectedDescription.message: Amount of local Content Delivery Network resource injections since installation.

blockMissingDescription.description: Block requests for missing resources description.
blockMissingDescription.message: Cancel intercepted request if the required resource is not locally available.

blockMissingTitle.description: Block requests for missing resources title.

disablePrefetchDescription.message: Prevent disallowed requests from leaking out to delivery networks.

extensionDescription.message: Protects you against tracking through "free", centralised, content delivery.

showIconBadgeDescription.message: Show the number of injected resources on the extension icon.

stripMetadataDescription.message: Erase sensitive data from allowed CDN-requests for improved privacy.

whitelistedDomainsDescription.message: Enter domains to whitelist them. Separate multiple entries with semi-colons (;).
